title: Alumnus Updates Contact Information
description: An alumnus calls to update their home address and employer information to stay connected with the university.

tasks.description: Identify the alumnus in the alumni database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the alumnus record.

tasks.description: Collect the new address and employment details from the alumnus.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the new information.

tasks.description: Update the alumnus's record in the development CRM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the record in the system.
